tiotropium_unmet_need.title: GOLD Guidelines 2024 â€“ COPD Management
tiotropium_unmet_need.snippet: Despite widespread use of LAMAs such as tiotropium, many COPD patients remain symptomatic with frequent exacerbations and poor inhaler technique.

tiotropium_unmet_need.title: Real-world evidence on tiotropium in asthma
tiotropium_unmet_need.snippet: Add-on tiotropium shows benefit in severe asthma, but underutilisation persists in LMICs due to cost and access barriers.
